content.question: ​The number of moose in a park is modeled by the sinusoidal function <math alttext="M"><semantics><mi>M</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> given by <math alttext="M open parentheses t close parentheses equals 174 plus 150 sin open parentheses fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 365 end fraction t close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>M</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>174</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>150</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>365</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is the number of days since January <math alttext="1"><semantics><mn>1</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: ​​<math alttext="M"><semantics><mi>M</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is decreasing on the interval <math alttext="0 less than t less than 182"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>182</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​<math alttext="M"><semantics><mi>M</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is decreasing on the interval <math alttext="92 less than t less than 273"><semantics><mrow><mn>92</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​<math alttext="M"><semantics><mi>M</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is decreasing on the interval <math alttext="183 less than t less than 365"><semantics><mrow><mn>183</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>365</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​<math alttext="M"><semantics><mi>M</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is decreasing on the intervals <math alttext="0 less than t less than 91"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>91</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="274 less than t less than 365"><semantics><mrow><mn>274</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>365</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: ​<math alttext="M"><semantics><mi>M</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is decreasing on the interval <math alttext="92 less than t less than 273"><semantics><mrow><mn>92</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
